segments.text: I would like you to meet my family . Can you come to dinner next week at my parents ' place ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeuks ! Do they know anything about me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I've told them a lot about you . They are excited to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you'll like them . My family is pretty laid back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How Ay people will be there at dinner ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's see . there's my mom and dad and my two brothers and one of my sisters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's good , I'm usually more comfortable in bigger families .
segments.speaker: S2
